title: Attn - Stuart from FontDiner
content:
I dont know what I did with your email ... ugh. Sorry I couldnt make it yesterday, I could not get out of work. keep me posted on the next one, and anything discussed yesterday.   
   
Sorry about posting this here guys, but I knew he would see it here.
author: kraftie

comments.content:
Thanks for the heads-up, I'll respond offline . . .   
   
Stuart :D

Stuart -   
Still haven't heard from you. My email address is here.   
- Kevin
